ae2helpers.configuration.title: ae2helpers Configs
ae2helpers.crafthelper.title: Auto-Import Pending Crafts
ae2helpers.crafthelper.tooltip: [AE2Helpers] Auto moves items that are auto-crafted via the recipe viewer to the crafting grid
ae2helpers.importcard.screen.title: Import Card Configuration
ae2helpers.importcard.resultsonly.toolti:
If enabled, only imports items that are expected outputs of the current crafting pattern.
If disabled, imports everything from the target machine.
ae2helpers.importcard.sync.tooltip:
If enabled, constantly checks if the Crafting CPU still wants the items.
Stops importing if the job is cancelled or fulfilled by other means.
Only works if `Import Crafting Results Only` is enabled
ae2helpers.importcard.direction.tooltip:
The side of the adjacent machine to pull items from.
'Auto' uses the side facing the Pattern Provider.
